comments:
I was using AspectjforJBuilder. It works fine with JBuilder8 but not with 
Jbuilder9....kindly make it compatible with jBuilder9 


Message: Compile error, caught Throwable: java.lang.AbstractMethodError: 
org.aspectj.tools.ajde.jbuilder.JBuilderPropertiesAdapter.getInJars()
Ljava/util/Set;
Stack trace: java.lang.AbstractMethodError: 
org.aspectj.tools.ajde.jbuilder.JBuilderPropertiesAdapter.getInJars()
Ljava/util/Set;

	at 
org.aspectj.ajde.internal.AspectJBuildManager$CompilerThread.getFormattedOptions
String(AspectJBuildManager.java:185)

	at org.aspectj.ajde.internal.AspectJBuildManager$CompilerThread.run
(AspectJBuildManager.java:161)

Fixed for AspectJ 1.1.1rc1.

We now support JBuilder9.  However, API incompatabilities mean that the AJDE 
OpenTool that supports JBuilder9 will not work for JBuilder8 and lower.
